experience.title: Software Developer

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Establish a comprehensive canary monitoring system for over 20 APIs on AWS CloudSearch 2011 version to proactively detect any issues well in advance of customer impact. This initiative aims to enhance customer satisfaction and bolster service reliability by identifying and addressing potential problems before they affect end-users.
experience.description_html: Establish a comprehensive canary monitoring system for over 20 APIs on AWS CloudSearch 2011 version to proactively detect any issues well in advance of customer impact. experience.title: Blockchain Research & Development
experience.description: Successfully implemented a robust Web Socket Connection system in Golang, connecting mobile nodes to a centralized server and ensuring continuous maintenance. Additionally, I developed an innovative Authenticator Program that seamlessly integrated with the blockchain's consensus mechanism, enhancing security with Scribble Hashing using SHA-256. I also designed an algorithm for generating Anna's and Sarahna's cryptocurrency, based on the network's changing node count, ensuring scalability and stability as the network grew.
experience.description_html: Successfully implemented a robust Web Socket Connection system in Golang, connecting mobile nodes to a centralized server and ensuring continuous maintenance. Additionally, I developed an innovative Authenticator Program that seamlessly integrated with the blockchain's consensus mechanism, enhancing security with Scribble Hashing using SHA-256. I also designed an algorithm for generating Anna's and Sarahna's cryptocurrency, based on the network's changing node count, ensuring scalability and stability as the network grew.

experience.title: Secretary
experience.description: Throughout my professional journey, I have taken the initiative to organize and conduct a series of impactful career-boosting workshops and soft-skills training sessions.  Additionally, I played a pivotal role in spearheading the development of two career assistance books, namely 'Playing it Soft' and 'The Guessing Game,'. In a mentoring capacity, I have had the privilege of guiding and supporting over 15 associate students, providing them with invaluable insights and advice to help them achieve their professional goals.

projects: [{"title":"Detection of Language Bias in Wikipedia","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"Developed an innovative NN-GA model, combining neural networks and genetic algorithms, to enforce Wikipedia's Neutral Point of View (NPOV) policy. By encoding article statements with advanced Language Models like BERT and RoBERTa and applying Ensemble Learning with Differential Evolution and Deep Neural Networks, achieved top F1 scores of 87% on the training dataset and 83% on the test dataset, which consisted of trending Wikipedia articles."},{"title":"Car Tracking System using BlockChain","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Sep 2020","description":"Created three Docker nodes across multiple PCs to simulate car transport between organizations. Using Hyperledger Fabric, designed a blockchain-based network channel for secure car detail communication. Also implemented a Golang Smart Contract to facilitate car data management like create, update, query car details in the network. Lastly, deployed the car tracking blockchain network, integrating it with a user-friendly Web Application via Swagger API's and Swagger UI for enhanced usability."},{"title":"Operational scheduling of freight trains on the Complex network","start_date":"Jan 2020","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"Formulated selection, crossover, and mutation genetic operators tailored for transforming train paths into actionable nodes and segments, enabling efficient optimization. My work extended to developing a Python simulator capable of visualizing and assessing near-optimal routes for multiple freight trains operating within intricate train networks. Notably, my algorithm outperformed existing heuristics by completing the task in 5% less time, surpassing the search capabilities of the entire feasible space"}]
